mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.CAMP_NO , C.CAMP_NAME , I.FILE_ROUTE , I.FILE_NAME FROM CAMP C JOIN CAMP_FILE F ON C.CAMP_NO = F.CAMP_NO JOIN IMAGEFILE I ON F.FILE_NO = I.FILE_NO WHERE C.CAMP_ADDRESS LIKE '%강원도%' AND C.CAMP_STATUS = 'Y' AND I.FILE_STATUS = 'N' AND I.FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM < 6
